name: CarThingie
description:
This "Game" was made for the 1st House Race JAM. It took me close to two weeks (less than 14 hours overall) to make, so please don't expect too much lol.

Race through 3 different modes! Time race, target practice, and multiplayer racing.

Includes:

- 3 modes.

- Controller support.

- A killer song from the YouTube library.

- That's it.

- No really.

- Okay I also voice the opening.... You're welcome.

Assets Used:

Sounds:

Music: Youtube Library

Explosion: https://freesound.org/people/derplayer/sounds/587197/

Car Cranking: https://freesound.org/people/JPBILLINGSLEYJR/sounds/468446/

Digital car: https://freesound.org/people/Kurd1228135/sounds/502189/

Car starting up: https://freesound.org/people/TyroneW/sounds/326376/

Car drifting: https://freesound.org/people/DeMarkracy/sounds/70068/

Art:

Furniture: https://f0x0ne.itch.io/furniture-pack

Furniture: https://kamisama887.itch.io/lorenz-fries-school-horror

Cars: https://tmd-studios.itch.io/cars

Road: https://nyknck.itch.io/citypackpixelart

---------------------------

Thank you for reading this mess of a description! oh and playing too I guess.
